input.sentences: i drew a robot fighting a bird that was on fire for my street mural .
my friend drew sauron as a flower .
my other friend drew a butterfly .
i walked around and saw someone drew one of doors opening .
there was a cool one that looked like a famous painting with the clock melting .
output.sentences: There were so many murals to see.
Artists made some in real time on the street.
And some even looked like they were actually melting.
